categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Donald Glover (born September 25, 1983) is an American actor, comedian, singer, writer, producer, director, rapper, and DJ who played Lando Calrissian in Solo: A Star Wars Story. Prior to the release of the film, he also played the character in a Saturday Night Live skit. Glover had previously provided the voice of Jedi Master Mace Windu in the non-canon special Robot Chicken: Star Wars Episode III.[source?]
